downscroll_desc: If enabled, notes will scroll downward instead of upward.
rating_offset_desc: Adjust the timing window (in milliseconds) for achieving a 'Sick!' rating.
loading_style_desc: Set the transition style for scene changes.
rm_ms_offset_desc:
Remove the 'xx ms' display when hitting notes.
Useful for specific mods.
scoretxt_bounce_desc: Add angular bounce effects to the score text when hitting notes.
scoretxt_style_desc: Modify the visual style of the score text.
iconbop_style_desc: Customize the bounce animation style for icons.
healthbar_style_desc: Change the visual appearance of the health bar.
change_language_desc:
Select the display language.
Restart the options menu to apply changes.
single_splashanim_desc: Force all notes to use a single splash animation.
smooth_hpbar_desc: Make the health bar transitions smoother.
showcase_style_desc: Configure the display style for the showcase screen.
cpu_strums_desc: Enable hit effects for bot arrows.
botplaytxt_style_desc: Change the visual effects for the BOTPLAY text display.
fpstxt_style_desc: Modify the font style of the FPS counter.
show_version_desc: Display the current version next to the FPS counter.
focus_game_desc: Pause the game when the window loses focus.
show_exrating_desc:
Display additional rating graphics.
File naming example: sick-extra.png.
Avoid enabling in pixel scenarios unless corresponding textures are available.
rating_bounce_desc:
Enhance the bounce animation for rating icons.
Note: This option may have known issues; disabling is recommended.
exrating_bounce_desc:
Enhance the bounce animation for extended rating icons.
Note: This option may have stability issues.
rating_opac_desc: Adjust the opacity of rating textures (100% = original opacity).
rm_perfect_judge_desc:
Remove the 'Perfect!' rating display.
Also affects extended rating textures.
timebar_style_desc: Modify the visual style of the timebar in gameplay.
charting_charting_tip: Any options here won't actually affect gameplay!
charting_mobile_tips:
Up/Down - Move Conductor's Time
Left/Right - Change Sections
Up/Down (On The Right) - Decrease/Increase Note Sustain Length
Hold Y to Increase/Decrease move by 4x

C - Preview Chart
A - Playtest Chart
X - Stop/Resume Song

Hold H and touch to Select Note(s)
Z - Hide Action TouchPad Buttons
V/D - Zoom in/out

${FLX_PITCH?G - Reset Song Playback Rate:}
charting_desktop_tips:
W/S/Mouse Wheel - Move Conductor's Time
A/D - Change Sections
Q/E - Decrease/Increase Note Sustain Length
Hold Shift/Alt to Increase/Decrease move by 4x

F12 - Preview Chart
Enter - Playtest Chart
Space - Stop/Resume song

Alt + Click - Select Note(s)
Shift + Click - Select/Unselect Note(s)
Right Click - Selection Box

R - Reset Section
Shift + R - Go Back to the Start of the Song
Z/X - Zoom in/out
Left/Right - Change Snap
Left Bracket / Right Bracket - Change Song Playback Rate
ALT + Left Bracket / Right Bracket - Reset Song Playback Rate

Ctrl + Z - Undo
Ctrl + Y - Redo
Ctrl + X - Cut Selected Notes
Ctrl + C - Copy Selected Notes
Ctrl + V - Paste Copied Notes
Ctrl + A - Select all in current Section
Ctrl + S - Quicksave
prompt_warning: Warning: Any unsaved progress will be lost.
prompt_delete_notes: Delete all Notes in the song?
prompt_delete_events: Delete all Events in the song?
charactereditor_move_faster: Hold C - Move Offsets 10x faster and Camera 4x faster
charactereditor_undo_offset: Ctrl + Z - Undo Last Paste or Reset
prompt_new_text:
There's unsaved progress,
are you sure you want to exit?
prompt_startover: Are you sure you want to start over?
prompt_unsaved:
Warning: Any unsaved progress
will be lost.
prompt_deleteallnote: Delete all Notes in the song?
prompt_deleteallevent: Delete all Events in the song?
low_quality_desc:
If enabled, disables some background details, decreases loading times, and improves performance.
Note: Some mods may not be optimized for this setting.
antialiasing_desc: If unchecked, disables anti-aliasing, increasing performance at the cost of sharper visuals.
shaders_desc: If unchecked, disables shaders. Some visual effects may be affected.
gpu_caching_desc: If enabled, allows the GPU to cache textures, reducing RAM usage. Not recommended for low-end GPUs.
framerate_desc: Set the maximum framerate for the game.
fps_rework_desc: If enabled, prevents the game from becoming 'slow' and 'smooth' when FPS is below the cap.
fps_warning_1:
Warning: Recommended FPS range is 60-240
Because Psych Engine is designed this way
fps_warning_2: WARNING: FRAMERATE NOT RECOMMENDED OVER 480 FPS!!!
notesplash_desc: Select your preferred Note Splash variation.
notesplashopacity_desc: How much transparent should the Note Splashes be.
hidehud_desc: If checked, hides most HUD elements.
timebar_desc: What should the Time Bar display?
flashinglights_desc: Uncheck this if you're sensitive to flashing lights!
camerazooms_desc: If unchecked, the camera won't zoom in on a beat hit.
scoretextgrow_desc:
If unchecked, disables the Score text growing
everytime you hit a note.
healthbaropacity_desc: How much transparent should the health bar and icons be.
vsync_desc:
If checked, Enables VSync fixing any screen tearing at the cost of capping the FPS to screen refresh rate.
(Must restart the game to have an effect)
pausemusic_desc: What song do you prefer for the Pause Screen?
checkforupdates_desc: On Release builds, turn this on to check for updates when you start the game.
discordrpc_desc: Uncheck this to prevent accidental leaks, it will hide the Application from your "Playing" box on Discord
combostacking_desc:
If unchecked, Ratings and Combo won't stack, saving on System Memory and making them easier to read.
Disabling this will also automatically disable rating bounce options
 (such as Rating Bounce and Extra-Rating Bounce).
middlescroll_desc: If checked, your notes get centered.
opponentnotes_desc: If unchecked, opponent notes get hidden.
ghosttapping_desc:
If checked, you won't get misses from pressing keys
while there are no notes able to be hit.
autopause_desc: If checked, the game automatically pauses if the screen isn't on focus.
popupscore_desc:
If unchecked, hitting notes won't make "sick", "good".. and combo popups
(Useful for low end devices).
disablereset_desc: If checked, pressing Reset won't do anything.
gameovervibration_desc: If checked, your device will vibrate at game over.
sustainsasone_desc:
If checked, Hold Notes can't be pressed if you miss,
and count as a single Hit/Miss.
Uncheck this if you prefer the old Input System.
hitsoundvolume_desc: Funny notes does "Tick!" when you hit them.
ratingoffset_desc:
Changes how late/early you have to hit for a "Sick!"
Higher values mean you have to hit later.
sickwindow_desc:
Changes the amount of time you have
for hitting a "Sick!" in milliseconds.
goodwindow_desc:
Changes the amount of time you have
for hitting a "Good" in milliseconds.
badwindow_desc:
Changes the amount of time you have
for hitting a "Bad" in milliseconds.
safeframes_desc:
Changes how many frames you have for
hitting a note earlier or late.
flashing_warning_text:
Hey, watch out!
This Engine contains some flashing lights!
Do you wish to enable them?
ratbounce_combo_error: Rating Bounce requires Combo Stacking enabled!
exratbounce_combo_error: Extra-Rating Bounce requires Combo Stacking enabled!
adjust_delay_combo_desc: Calibrate input timing and combo positioning
graphics_desc: Adjust resolution, framerate, and quality settings
visuals_desc: Modify visual effects and HUD elements
perfectwindow_desc: Adjust the timing window (in milliseconds) for achieving a 'Perfect!!' rating.
fps_position_desc: Set the position of the FPS counter on screen
fps_spacing_desc: Adjust the spacing between FPS counter and screen edges
camhud_zoom_desc: Adjust the zoom level of HUD elements.
legacy_notepos_desc: Use the old note position system.
ratings_pos_desc: Set the position of the ratings on screen.
firstlaunch_warning: This mod contains flashing effects that may cause discomfort
bot_addscore_desc_en:
If enabled, when bot hit notes, the score will increase.
(Doesn't count towards the final score.)
use_system_cursor_desc: If enabled, the game will use your system's default mouse cursor.
mods_import_desc:
(Experimental Feature)
If enabled, you can import mods by dragging and dropping mod ZIP files.
hud_zoomstyle_desc: Adjust the zoom style of the HUD elements.
bgvol_desc:
Enable background volume adjustment.
This requires 'Auto Pause' to be disabled.
bgvol_level_desc:
Adjust the volume of the game when it is in the background.
Same as above, requires 'Auto Pause' to be disabled.
gameplay_combospr_desc: Add a 'Combo' pop-up effect when hitting arrows.
ratcounter_desc: Enable the rating counter to display the number of hits for each rating type.
watermark_desc: Show a watermark on the gameplay screen.
